title: Indefinite product
summary: In mathematics, the indefinite product operator is the inverse operator of Q ( f ( x ) ) = f ( x + 1 ) f ( x ) {\textstyle Q(f(x))={\frac {f(x+1)}{f(x)}}} . It is a discrete version of the geometric integral of geometric calculus, one of the non-Newtonian calculi. Some authors use term discrete multiplicative integration.
